text: This thread starts with the first street, and therefore ignores the Ohlone, who were here for thousands of years before the Spanish showed up and began murdering them in the name of the church. There are no laughs to be had about that shit.
The very first things to be built in San Francisco were a military installation at Fort Point in the Presidio and the Mission San Francisco de As√≠s itself. This created a complicated chain of names.

title: Gough Street
